Description: The open heart at the front gives the pocket watch a hint of nostalgia, reminding us of the stunning craftsmanship used back in the day. Pocket watches remain symbols of style and elegance. Engraved details on the front and back of the metal case are presented as an homage to eras past. - Mechanical hand-winding movement（Magnet and temperature would affect the accuracy of the watch）- Classic skeleton design, elegant antique style silver components- See-through top cover flips open to view to face dial with roman numerals- The top view window cover is hardened acrylic, scratch and impact resistant- Victorian crafting finish is professionally plated on a steel case- Case measures 50 mm in diameter - Chain measures 370 mm long- Splash proof but not water proof- It comes with gift box, cleaning cloth Setting the time1.Grasp & pull the crown (button at the top) until you hear a click2.Turn the crown to set the time3.Press the crown firmly back towards the watch until you hear a click Winding the watchYou are highly recommended to wind up the watch daily before use. Twist the winding crown (same button you set the time with) approximately 15 turns. Stop if you feel resistance.

Charity.Mission: Doctors Without Borders is an international independent medical humanitarian organization that delivers emergency aid to people affected by armed conflict, epidemics, natural and man-made disasters, and exclusion from health care in nearly 70 countries.

Title: Pocket Watch/Mens Gift/Mechanical Watch/Groomsmen Gift/Boyfriends Gift/Dads Gift
